eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Illinois; AT 10:15 PM ON OCT 06, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 01:15 AM OCT 11, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the required Monthly Test of the Emergency Alert System originated by the Illinois Emergency Management Agency IEMA. Rebroadcast within 1 hour.
